title: Nebula Coffee Co.
description: Complete brand identity for a premium specialty coffee roastery. The design captures the cosmic journey of coffee beans from origin to cup.
challenge: Create a distinctive brand that stands out in the saturated coffee market while maintaining approachability.
solution: Developed a celestial-themed identity system with custom typography and a versatile logo that works across all touchpoints.

title: Echoes Magazine
description: Editorial design for a quarterly arts and culture magazine. Focus on bold typography and immersive visual storytelling.
challenge: Design a magazine that appeals to both traditional print lovers and digital-native readers.
solution: Created a dynamic grid system that allows for creative layouts while maintaining readability and brand consistency.

title: Flux Finance App
description: UI/UX design for a modern fintech application. Clean interfaces with intuitive navigation and data visualization.
challenge: Simplify complex financial data and make investment accessible to first-time users.
solution: Designed a minimalist interface with progressive disclosure, onboarding flows, and clear visual hierarchy.

title: Urban Dreams Series
description: A personal illustration series exploring the intersection of urban architecture and dreamlike surrealism.
challenge: Express the emotional experience of city life through abstract visual narratives.
solution: Created a series of digital illustrations combining geometric architecture with organic, flowing elements.

title: Artisan Bakery
description: Warm and inviting brand identity for a local artisan bakery. Hand-crafted aesthetic meets modern design.
challenge: Balance traditional craftsmanship values with contemporary visual appeal.
solution: Developed a brand system featuring hand-drawn elements, warm textures, and a custom wordmark.

title: Annual Report 2023
description: Corporate annual report design with infographics and data visualization.
challenge: Present dense financial information in an engaging and accessible format.
solution: Created custom infographics and a clear visual system for presenting complex data.

title: Wellness Dashboard
description: Health tracking dashboard with intuitive data visualization and progress tracking.
challenge: Make health data motivating rather than overwhelming for users.
solution: Designed a calming interface with celebration moments and gentle progress indicators.

title: Mythical Creatures
description: Illustration series for a children's book featuring mythical creatures from various cultures.
challenge: Create culturally respectful illustrations that appeal to young readers.
solution: Developed a vibrant, whimsical style that honors cultural origins while being accessible.
